forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 3 to 12 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 18 mph.

weather_report:
The evening settles gently over Downtown San Francisco, wrapping the city in a cool embrace as clouds drift across the night sky. The temperature whispers around fifty-two degrees, inviting a light sweater or a cozy jacket to fend off the evening chill. The west-southwest winds dance lightly, carrying the scent of the bay, brushing past at three to twelve miles per hour, a mere caress from the horizon. 

Looking ahead to tomorrow, a bright invitation awaits as the sun emerges with promises of a clear sky, peeking down upon the city’s iconic skyline. It’s expected to crest at around sixty-six before the afternoon softens the warmth to a more mellow sixty-four. A southwest breeze may sweep through stronger, brushing the day with more vigor as it climbs to eighteen mph, perhaps ruffling a few coats as people stroll along the waterfront. While the fog may still linger in the early hours—a familiar resident this time of year—its presence will give way to clarity, allowing for wonderful views of the Golden Gate and beyond. Tomorrow beckons to wanderers: a visit to one of the city's open-air markets, or perhaps a leisurely walk through the park, where the flowers bloom in tandem with the sun. Remember to dress in layers; embrace the morning chill but savor the warmth of the afternoon sun when it gifts us its radiant glow.
